menuItems.displaydescription: Residents can use these services to view, update, manage or share their data. They can also report an issue in case of a grievance.

subMenus.description: View the history of all the transactions associated with your logged-in UIN/ VID. You can also view their details and if any unaccounted entry is found, a report can be raised against the same.
View details of the existing VIDs, create new VIDs, delete an existing VID or download a VID card.
View the status of all the Authentication types. You can choose to lock or unlock Authentication types like iris Authentication, email Authentication, etc.
Track the status of an event ID (EID) associated with the logged-in UIN/ VID. You can also view the detailed information about the entered EID.
Residents can select the data to be added to their credential. They can also preview the chosen data and download it.
Residents can choose the data to be shared with any of the registered partners to avail various third party services.

Residents can update the already existing data associated with their UIN/ VID. The data that can be updated includes name, gender, DOB, address, documents uploaded, phone number, email ID, preferred language, etc.

subMenus.displayName: Click here to download your UIN card or to know the status of your UIN
Click here to verify your  phone number/ email ID

dashboard.uindescription: Residents can use these services to view, update, change, manage or share their data. They can also report an issue in case of a grievance.

updatedemographic.title: Update My Data
updatedemographic.enteredValuesNotMatch: The entered values do not match.

updatedemographic.InvalidFileSize: The document you are trying to upload exceeds the file size limit of 2mb. Please upload a document within 2mb.

updatedemographic.sameFileUploading: Please upload file with a different file name.

pendingDrafts.heading: Existing request found, action required!
pendingDrafts.descriptionDetails: We have found an existing Data Update Request which is still in progress. In order to raise a new request, you will have to delete the existing request.
pendingDrafts.warnMsg: Are you sure you want to cancel the existing Data Update Request to update your?
pendingDrafts.warnMsgTwo: You cannot cancel this request since it is still in Pending state. Please try after sometime.

updatedemographic.draftCanceled: Your existing Data Update Request has been successfully canceled. You can now proceed to raise another Data Update request.

trackservicerequest.searchLabel: Enter the Event ID that you want to track

trackservicerequest.raiseSupportRequest: To raise a support request against this EID,

personalisedcard.title: Get Personalised Card
personalisedcard.mainlabel: Kindly select at least three attributes to proceed.
personalisedcard.introDescription: Residents can select the data to be added to their credential. They can also preview the chosen data and download it.

physicalcard.title: Order A Physical Card
physicalcard.introDescription: This service can be used to order a physical card to the preferred address. The types of cards available, tariffs and other features will depend on the partner chosen in the process.

sharewithpartner.mainlabel: Kindly select at least three attributes to proceed.
sharewithpartner.sharePartnerSuccessMsg: Your data has been successfully shared with the chosen partner
sharewithpartner.introDescription: Residents can choose the data to be shared with any of the registered partners to avail various third party services.

getMyUin.downloadedSuccessFully: Your UIN card has been successfully downloaded against the Event ID: $eventId.
getMyUin.invalidOtp: Invalid OTP was entered. Please click resend OTP and try again with a valid OTP

termsAndConditionsDescription: Your data will be shared with the chosen third party (credential partner)
You are responsible for any and all costs and fees associated with agreements entered into with the third-party provider.
Under no circumstances will we be liable for loss or misuse of data whatsoever, arising from the usage of data shared with the partner.

if a third-party provider ceases to make its service available or requires MOSIP to suspend or terminate the provision of all or any part of its services to you that part of data or services will be terminated immediately without notice or further obligation to you.
conditionsForupdateDemographicData: The data chosen by you will be updated after the proof of address or Proof of identity is duly verified.
You are responsible for any and all costs and fees associated with an agreement to update your data.
You are responsible for any changes made to your already existing personal data or uploaded document to support the same.
genericmessage.agreeLabel: I agree to the terms and conditions to share my credentials with the chosen partner
genericmessage.agreeLabelForUpdateData: I agree to the terms and conditions to update demograohic data

personalisedcardConditions.title: Download Your Personalised Card
personalisedcardConditions.description: It will take some time for us to get the card ready. We will send you a link using which you can download the requested card. You can also download the card from the notification section once it is ready.
personalisedcardConditions.agreeLabel: Send VID to registered email ID

manageMyVidMessages.createdSuccessfully: Your VID has been successfully created against the Event ID: $eventId.

manageMyVidMessages.downloadedSuccessFully2: It will take some time to get the card ready. You will be sent a link on your registered email ID and/or phone number using which you can download the requested VID card. Alternatively, it can also be downloaded from the Track Request once you receive a notification stating the card is ready.

personalisedcardMessages.downloadedSuccessFully: Your personalized card has been successfully downloaded against the Event ID: $eventId. The password will be sent to your registered email ID or phone number.

autologout.preview: You will be timed out in 60 seconds due to inactivity. Please click anywhere on the screen to re-activate your session.
autologout.post: You have been logged out due to inactivity.

revokevid.Perpetual: A perpetual VID has no expiry date and no limit on the number of transactions that can be performed using this VID. One UIN can be associated with only $instancesVID perpetual VID at a time.
revokevid.Temporary: A temporary VID is valid for $expiryTime minutes and only $transactionLimit transaction can be performed using this VID. One UIN can be associated with $instancesVID temporary VIDs at a time.
revokevid.OneTimeUse: A one-time VID's has no expiry date but only $transactionLimit transaction can be performed using this VID. One UIN can be associated with $instancesVID one-time VID at a time.

secureMyID.Email OTP Authentication: On locking/unlocking 'Email OTP Authentication', any Authentication attempt made using an email OTP will be disabled/ enabled.
secureMyID.Mobile OTP Authentication: On locking/unlocking 'Mobile OTP Authentication', any Authentication attempt made using a mobile OTP will be disabled/ enabled.
secureMyID.Demographic Authentication: On locking/unlocking 'Demographic Authentication', any Authentication attempt made using demographic details (name, age, address, or any combination of those) will be disabled/ enabled.
secureMyID.Fingerprint Authentication: On locking/unlocking 'Fingerprint Authentication', any Authentication attempt made using a fingerprint will be disabled/ enabled.
secureMyID.Iris Authentication: On locking/unlocking 'Iris Authentication', any Authentication attempt made using an iris will be disabled/ enabled.
secureMyID.Face Authentication: On locking/unlocking 'Face Authentication', any Authentication attempt made using face will be disabled/ enabled.

InfomationContent.trackStatus: Please enter the EID (Event ID) associated with the event that you want to track. It is important that the EID you enter is associated with the logged-in UIN.
InfomationContent.getUin: An AID is your $AID-digit Application ID which was provided to you after registration. A UIN is your $UIN-digit Unique Identity Number. A VID is your $VID-digit Virtual ID.
InfomationContent.verifyChannel: A UIN is your 10-digit Unique Identity Number. VID is your 16-digit Virtual ID.
